title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
OB: When attempting to create a JAR file using the packager, an error message is displayed stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
SR:
1. Open the JAR packager.
2. Select the desired options.
3. Press the 'Finish' button to create the JAR file.
4. Observe the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
